#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Start geth with no accounts configured

`$ geth --goerli`

attach a console

`$ geth attach $HOME/.ethereum/goerli/geth.ipc`

type in the console:

`personal.unlockAccount(eth.accounts[0])`

crash happens
